channel.title: Youtube Trending
channel.description:
How small Eritrea built such a large terror Yaw's Newsletter: https://substack.com/@yawboadu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hoserforever/ Business Email: h0sermailYT@gmail.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/h0serr
“Africa’s North Korea”: https://www.economist.com/the-economist-explains/2018/08/14/why-eritrea-is-called-africas-north-korea “Africa’s gulag state”: https://www.economist.com/middle-east-and-africa/2022/05/26/inside-eritrea-africas-gulag-state Brittanica: https://www.britannica.com/place/Eritrea/ Diaspora Relations: https://www.researchgate.net/publication/351330474_Remittance_Houses_and_Transnational_Citizenship_Mapping_Eritrea's_Diaspora-State_Relationships Dictatorland - Paul Kenyon Emigration by Country: https://worldpopulationreview.com/country-rankings/immigration-by-country Energy in Eritrea: https://www.irena.org/-/media/Files/IRENA/Agency/Statistics/Statistical_Profiles/Africa/Eritrea_Africa_RE_SP.pdf Eritrean Border: https://hrc-eritrea.org/how-many-eritreans-have-to-die-at-the-border-before-european-countries-admit-the-truth-that-the-shoot-to-kill-orders-for-eritrean-border-guards-are-still-in-place/ Human Rights World Report: https://www.hrw.org/world-report/2023/country-chapters/eritrea Isaias Afwerki: https://www.dw.com/en/from-liberator-to-oppressor-30-years-of-eritrea-under-isaias-afwerki/a-65708163 Italian Administration: https://shabait.com/2009/11/13/italian-administration-in-eritrea/ Political History: https://jacobin.com/2023/06/eritrea-isaias-afwerki-elf-ethiopian-conflict Refugee Statistics: https://www.unhcr.org/refugee-statistics/download/?url=8uCsX1 Refugees & Punishments for Leaving: https://www.refworld.org/docid/577b6d024.html Self-reliance paradox/Quotes: https://www.ssoar.info/ssoar/bitstream/handle/document/80692/ssoar-remittr-2021-1-hirt_et_al-Eritreas_self-reliance_narrative_and_the.pdf?sequence=1 Trade Profile: https://oec.world/en/profile/country/eri
0:00 Africa's North Korea 3:00 Militarism 8:36 Power 11:38 Command 15:33 Isolation
